attributes.action: Do not make Covid 19 vaccination compulsory for our Care Home Workers.
attributes.background: Forcing our Care Home workers to vaccinate against Covid 19 is profoundly unlawful, illiberal, unethical, discriminatory and undemocratic. Compulsory vaccination has no place in a democratic and free society. People must be free to choose what to put into their own bodies.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842

Prohibit employers from requiring employees to have a Covid-19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607
